name: PoWeR oFf (:D i'm happy)
description:
Hi, I'm 8 years old and this is my first game :D

This game is for the gogodot jam 2. The game is not finished yet.

Story: so there is a boy named "Jim" the energy source is broken by a toxic meteor so this old man (I haven't thought of a name yet...) he asks u to fix the energy source  so yeah. I did the art. I used Aseprite. it is good for animation. originally I wanted to use krita, but aseprite is way  better.

Latter im gonna add a multiplayer option.

Use space to attack.

You can go through trees.
